name: liking

a feeling that you like someone or something; the fact of liking someone or something: She has a liking for fine wines. I'm developing quite a liking for jazz. The dessert was too sweet for my liking (= I like it less sweet).formal Is the room to your liking, Sir (= are you satisfied with it)? Synonyms
